title: Short-Intensive Course on Mobile Marketing Educational Application Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic marketing theory and digital platform management experience
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment focused on practical training to enhance mobile marketing application design capabilities for managers/leaders within corporations

learning_goals: Application interface design strategies reflecting visual, auditory, and collaborative learning styles can be proposed based on learner analysis
A structuring strategy for mobile marketing educational content can be established and integrated with interactive elements (tools)
A prototype of an application applicable to real corporate environments can be developed through project-based assessment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
